import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'], }) export class HeaderComponent { constructor(private router: Router) {} isHomeScreen(): boolean { return this.router.url === '/home'; } }
